title: Lunchbox Reveals His Massive Tax Refund Amount + Should Parents Read Their Child’s Diary?
itunes:title: Lunchbox Reveals His Massive Tax Refund Amount + Should Parents Read Their Child’s Diary?
description:
It’s Tax Day! Lunchbox does his own taxes each year and always gets a massive refund. He reveals how big of a check he’s getting back this year. Also, is it ever ok to read your child’s diary? The show gives their opinions on that and parents call in to share their thoughts. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
